Posts.Content: Feb 8, 2017 08:47AM Capemaygal wrote: I have learned thru all this mess of mine that you need to rely on what your doctors are telling you. Ask them specific questions and take someone with you to all your appointments during the time that surgery and treatment plans are being made. My boyfriend goes with me and he takes notes. Keep yourself busy. That works for me as well.
